website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and accurate set of breast milk bags designed to stand on their own and also lay flat in your freezer.
pros: Double zip lock to prevent leaking
Thicker and sturdier than other bags
Larger than most bags on the market
Made by a company that understands every drop is liquid gold
Does not leak after coming out of the freezer
cons: The measurements on the bag are not as accurate as they could be

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I received a bad batch...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got a bad batch of bags. When I first used the bags, I thought they were good until the second day. They were not sealed properly. It seems like every other few bags are not sealed properly. I've wasted about 16-24 oz of milk using these bags. I'm exclusively pumping, so it's very disappointing to come across bags that aren't sealed well. I am working very hard to provide milk for my child, and the last thing I need is added stress from bags not being sealed at the bottom. I've contacted customer service. I will update when I receive their response. These bags could be great with my quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Dpa0620

customer_reviews.title: Good storage bags with a few inconveniences
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are quality milk storage bags in that they are made of heavy duty material, don't leak, they stand up on their own, and they have clear space for labeling each bag. However, the measurement lines are not accurate no matter how I try to adjust the bag (not a huge deal since you can label the volume on the bag). Also, many of the bags do not open when I tear off the perforated part and I have to use scissors to open the top of the bag, which is a little inconvenient. Overall a good product though and I am not unhappy with them. They serve their purpose well in that they store breastmilk securely without leaking!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: The worst milk bags I have used
customer_reviews.text: Hate these. If you don’t open them just right, they zipper doesn’t separate and you wind up with a defective, useless bag. I don’t know about most breastfeeding moms but for me, I don’t have endless amounts of time to spend inspecting and perfecting how to open this bag correctly. I need to be able to rip the seal off, unzip the bag, fill, and done. Thought hey you get what you pay for and since these are expensive I should be getting a superior product. WRONG. Maybe I got a bad batch, who knows but I will not be wasting my money on these again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags to store expressed milk as I am exclusively breastfeeding and pumping. These bags are legit! Okay so the measurements on the bag are 100% INaccurate but who cares! You pump into your bottles and write your measurements from there. Each bag holds up to 8 ounces but I only store a maximum of 5oz in each bag because that's the size of my bottle-feeds. These bags seal like Fort Knox and stay leak-proof. Every drop of milk that I put in, stays in. They freeze perfectly fine to keep my milk fresh. Any product that helps make the breastfeeding and pumping process easier gets my vote. Mommy's Precious for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great bags that hold a lot of milk!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for a year and I am almost done pumping. I have only had 1 or 2 leak in all that time and I typically had 50 or so frozen at a time in rotation, so I've use a lot of bags. The bags easily hold 8oz of milk (sometimes I even have 9 in there), they close easily, and I flatten them with a milk storage drawer. I am so glad I found them because it was annoying pumping as much extra milk as I was in the beginning before she was eating more and having to put it into smaller bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jen V

customer_reviews.title: Durable. No leak. A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product since May. It's lightweight durable and does not leak. I've never had a bag leak!!! Fresh frozen and nah squeezed a bit it did not leak or burst. It's a double seal on top. Freezes flat when you put the recommended 8oz but I've put as much as 11oz in one bag and it still holds amazingly! 11oz does does freeze flat though. The measuring is slightly off but not much. I use my bottles to measure out the correct oz. wide mouth when pouring in and pouring out milk. You get more bags for a great price! I've ordered this product multiple times with my own money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #1 Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are amazing! I recently had baby #3. I didn’t want to buy bags I’ve used in the past with my other kids because none of them were good. I took a gamble and added these on my baby registry. I must say I am so happy I did! These are so well made!! They’re a nice sturdy plastic...not flimsy like other brands. They’re also leak-proof! My baby is 5 Months old and I haven’t had any accidents yet! Other brands’ seams would open and all my milk would leave out. Overall, 5 stars and highly recommended product!!! You won’t regret trying them.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Best storage bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i had these for my first 2 kids! I switched to these after a few months of pumping and im so glad i did. Ive always used the lanisnoh brand and layed my bags flat while freezing and the lansinoh ones ALWAYS leak when thawing and make such a mess! I stored over 2000oz with these new bags and Ive only had 1 or 2 leak! Absolutely amazing! They are sturdy and stand upright with fresh or thawed milk in them and they fit 8oz much better then the lansinoh brand. Love them! I would recommend the switch to these to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Katie E

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bags for my liquid gold !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 2 months to store my liquid gold aka breast milk. Overall it’s been a great product and have been able to store my milk both in the fridge and freezer. I haven’t had a leak issue out of these bags, maybe a spillage but that’s my fault since I am trying to pour milk from a bag to a bottle while holding baby with other hand. But you know mom life, have to learn to do everything with one hand. Great product for the price and the amount able to store a little more then the average amount which is great. Totally recommend, will be ordering more soon !
customer_reviews.author: Ruben D.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an overproducer and froze a ton of milk. Thousands of ounces! I’ve tried every bag from Target, Walmart, and the Kiinde Twist top bags. About 1 out every 4 or 5 bags seemed to leak once frozen. I purchased these bags because they were cheap and I was thinking all brands are going to leak anyway so why not.. I ended up ordering these bags TEN times.. thats 1,100 bags. I used ALL of them. NONE of them leaked! Some were in the freezer for a full year before I pulled out to use, and they were still perfectly sealed with no cracks in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING storage bags. They’re super thick and stand up on their own when filled, also you don’t have to worry about it all sort of being at the top and spilling because it actually goes all the way to the bottom when you pour it. I wish I wouldn’t have stocked up on other brand bags because these are the only ones I want to use now! The measurements aren’t accurate, but I haven’t ever used bags to measure because they never seem to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Brower

customer_reviews.title: Least Favorite Bag
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many bags and these are the worst: 1) I can't get them open without breaking my fingers in half. The zip-lock is near cemented shut. 2) I have accidentally torn apart 3 bags so far just trying to pry open the bag. I cannot wait until these are all used up, so I can keep going with Smilo, which is so far the best boobie bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: The best bags yet!
customer_reviews.text: Update- I now have 150 bags (1000 oz) in the freezer. I still think these bags are fantastic! I have tried a four different brands and these are by far the best. I purchased the 100 pack, so I wont have to buy more for awhile... but when I do, it will be these. They are large enough to hold a bottle that I pumped to the top (about 7 ozs) AND close it without it oozing over the top. I had been using the medela. These are much more durable and seal fantastic! So far I have pumped and packaged over 200 ozs and these work great.
customer_reviews.author: D. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bags, thick and closes tightly. Only had 1 bag leak on me after freezing but it looked like the corner has ripped as if it was dropped after taking it out of the freezer. I can hold more than 8oz! For quality and amount, this is such a great price! I like it better than Lansinoh bags and they are comparable to Medela bags. They stand nicely in the freezer but if you like flat bags then these may not be for you unless you just put less Breast milk into the bags then it’ll work. I’ve purchased these twice now and wish I hadn’t tried other bags before repurchasing these because these were better than Bimark bags.
customer_reviews.author: LyndaEllard

customer_reviews.title: You really don't need the big brands.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfection. I really didn't understand they hype with the big brand bags. The flappy parts for documentation SUCK. These bags are thick, they stand upright, and I can label them just fine but sealing them (sans air) and leaning them over the counter. I love these so much I am including them in my baby shower basket (it's really more of a survival kit). for my bestie. I have purchased three boxes so far and have had no issues. They freeze well, thaw well, stay sealed, and are easy to open and shut. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not very accurate (or I just haven’t figured out how to open them all the way but....that’s pretty intuitive, no?). I pump into medela bottles and on my last pump I got 8 oz but when I poured it into the bag it was well above the 8 line. I usually use lansinoh bags but bought these because they are the only bags I found that hold more than 6 oz and I was tired of using two bags for one pump nearly every time. I just need to remember to measure before I pour
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I wanted to be able to store more than 6oz per bag. I really like these bags. They’re a thicker plastic than other brands. I haven’t had any leak issues and the 8oz measurement on the bag seems to be correct and even if it wasn’t it wouldn’t matter because I write the amount i pour into the bag on the bag with a sharpie anyway. I plan to reorder these once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: My go to bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They freeze super flat, the tab is easy to tear, they haven’t leaked, they’re really easy to get the air out as well. They’re officially my go to bag for my frozen milk now! Measurements ARE accurate as long as you open the bag fully. However, I measure using the same bottle I feed from, so it doesn’t matter to me anyway. Good to know if I’m in a pinch, I can rely on the measurements on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pelekakis

customer_reviews.title: Holes at bottom of bags
customer_reviews.text: I am never one to write negative reviews, but this is unacceptable! 3 times now, I’ve poured an entire 5 oz bottle into a brand new bag and the entire thing has come pouring out the bottom! You cannot see that the plastic is not sealed at the bottom until there is pressure on it, and it’s too late! Doesn’t make for a very happy mama to see liquid gold splattered all over the kitchen floor 3 times!
customer_reviews.author: sophe pope

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I never thought I’d be so hyped up over milk bags before, but I have to say that I love this product 100%. Just by touching the bags I could tell that they were made of quality and durable material. The double ziplock closure really ensures that the milk doesn’t leak out. I’ve never had issues with leakage after defrosting milk. The measurements on the bag are really close to the measurements on my medela bottles, you just have to make sure you open the bottom of the bag (so the bag can stand upright) before measuring. Definitely recommend this product! Way better than the medela pump and save bags.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Magday

customer_reviews.title: Bags are hard to open - seals rip off
customer_reviews.text: Quality of bag: the bags are thicker than the lasinoh bags that I used but it doesn’t seem to affect heating up the milk so that’s good. However breaking the seal is hard and many bags have torn when I try to open them. So the thickness works against them here. Measurement: a little off, you have to make sure the bottom is fully open and you prop the top open. Lay flat: no this does not lay as flat as I would like in the freezer for space.
customer_reviews.author: Elle O'Bara

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but my favorite so far...so 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: These bags are sturdy. Way more comfortable using these than the flimsy Lansinoh bags. The measurements on the side aren't accurate because it depends on how wide the bag is (which is an issue with all breastmilk bags), so just be sure to check the bottle you pumped into and write that amount on the bag. It's true that the top doesn't tear off perfectly like some other reviewers have mentioned, but it doesn't affect the seal of the bag so who even cares?
customer_reviews.author: W. N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, occasional issues
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these, but this time one of my boxes has a defective tear off tab on the top. I thought it was just the first bag I used, but its all 110 of them. I am just using scissors to open the top now but it's frustrating when you are exclusively pumping and have to spend extra time on something silly like that. The other three boxes were all fine. And for the money these are still my favorite to buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: The best milk bags in the market.  Definitely #1.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these bags. I used them 3 years ago for my son i pumped for 4 months and went through boxes of these. Not one leak ....they were easy to use and never leaked not ones. I fill them up with 10 oz milk and thaw them in warm water. Now 3 years later i had another baby April 23rd and i just went through the 3rd box i just ordered 2 more boxes that's how much I love them. They are the best. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Caroline ropta

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags!! They’re sturdy enough to stand up, manage with one hand (without spilling!) and they hold 8oz! Most of the bags I’ve used up until now hold a max of 6oz, which is annoying. These are great! They also freeze well and seem to hold up great. The double zip seal works very well; I’ve never had any leaks. I will be buying more of these. I only wish I had found them several months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shalene

customer_reviews.title: We like these bags and have bought them multiple times
customer_reviews.text: We like these bags and have bought them multiple times, our favorite so far for milk storage. The only issue is that the bags are slightly different from order to order. The plastic is not the same. Sometimes when pouring into them the bottom expands allowing the bag to stand and be filled easily. Other times the plastic is a little more flimsy and you need to either pour a lot of milk into the bag or force the bottom to spread in order for the bag to stand.
customer_reviews.author: Break235

customer_reviews.title: Superior to the compensation
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite breast milk storage bags by far! I started using them with my first child (2017) when I was exclusively pumping. They are far superior in durability than other bags I tried (Lansinoh, Target, Medela) and I have never had a bag leak! I am using them again with my second child (2019). They will always be my go-to breast milk storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: jenpar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed/Defective
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these breastmilk storage bags many times and have loved them. However, this last time I ordered, I nearly broke my finger because I tried so hard to open them. I have tried opening 6 bags so far and each one has ripped because the seal does not open. Very disappointed to have spent this much money on a default product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M. Raimondi

customer_reviews.title: 4 Months in and no leaks
customer_reviews.text: These bags have been amazing so far, everything I've hoped for. There have been no leaks and they seem to be accurate to me, just make sure you open the bottom gusset all the way when filling (I stop halfway through, open the bottom, and then fill the rest of the way.) They don't freeze very flat but that wasn't an issue for me. I can fit about 7 frozen bags in a gallon size freezer bag to organize them. Thank you for making this reliable product! I have tried out many different kinds of bags and these are the best I've found!
customer_reviews.author: ashica133

customer_reviews.title: Great bags but can be hard to get open
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because they can be very difficult to open bc and rip on the inside above the ziplock. I’ve had to throw away several bags because of this. Other than that they are very sturdy and do not leak like the lansinoh bags. I rather throw away several unused bags than lose one drop of milk because of a leaky bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Junkie

customer_reviews.title: I like that customer service emails and wants to make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that customer service emails and wants to make sure you’re satisfied with their product. For the most part I am. I like the bangs stand up mostly after starting to pour milk in, the double zipper & the measurements are fairly accurate to the bottle measurements. I do seem to have trouble with the milk warming up in my bottle warmer compared the the last brand i had used. Have not froze any milk yet with these bags but so far haven’t had issues with any leaking
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I bought these same bags back in March and I loved them! I reordered last month and I don't know if I received a defective batch or what but I can't get these to open... It's almost impossible to pull some of the ziplocks apart and I have ripped at least 15 bags trying to do so.... It's so frustrating and unfortunately I will not be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cotteta

customer_reviews.title: almost looks like a fleck of dried paint or something - before ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are supposed to be sterilized... but this morning I found something inside the bag - not sure what it is, almost looks like a fleck of dried paint or something - before it was even opened. The speck moved when the bag moved so it's not dry to the plastic, it would have come out in the milk if I had not seen it before using the bag. Disappointing, I liked these bags until now - look closely before you use to store your liquid gold!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenL

customer_reviews.title: Quality storage bags
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Philips Avent reusable containers. I still use them but purchased these for travel. They've been excellent and even though reusable containers are better for the environment, I like that these are one-time use and clean. They stand up well and are easy to read. There is a part to tear off of the top that guarantees nothing sneaks into the bags before you are ready to use them. I've used them in the refrigerator and freezer and haven't had any problems so far. I can't think of any improvements at this time. I plan on ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: ccingiro

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't consistent
customer_reviews.text: The first time I purchased these bags I was very impressed by the thickness and durability. However, the last package I received had a defective perforation. I was not able to open the bag without scissors. For a sleep deprived mom who exclusively pumps, cutting the perforation each time I needed a new storage bag became frustrating. Product would be better if this company practiced quality control on their product.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best breastmilk bags I've found.
customer_reviews.text: I exclusively pumped for 6 months and tried MANY brands of bags during that time. This bag takes the cake. I like the size as they freeze pretty flat with 6 oz pours. The bag is perfect thickness with shoes for No leaking, and easy to pour from. 4 stars because of the difficulty I have opening the damn things. The perforated top is hard to get without ripping the bag so I end up cutting the tops off with scissors to open the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mundt

customer_reviews.title: A most! (If you’re doing a milk bank)
customer_reviews.text: If you’re nursing and also pumping (so you’re doing your own little milk bank for later on) these milky bags storage ARE THE BEST SOLUTION! I’ve been doing between 4 and 6,5 oz per bag and I’m able to stack them, around 8-10 frozen bags inside a 1 gallon (ziplock bag). Material is thick and for sure 100% leak free!!! Thank you amazon!
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: The best milk storage bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I've gone through 4 boxes and none leaked when defrosting. I like that bags can stay up right while some other brands cannot and fall over instead. This makes it really easy to use when filling up and when defrosting and pouring out. Great quality product, the only milk storage bag I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yolochkina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice and sturdy. Love the double zipper and have never had a leak with them. I've noticed the measurement lines are off by about 1oz (ie I pour in 3oz and it reaches the 4oz line) but I don't really mind because I always write the amount on the bag. Added bonus they are very cute. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: No leakage, stands up perfectly, and freezes razor-thin!
customer_reviews.text: Best storage bags by far! I used Lansing extensively and had leakage several times and the flimsiness of those bags made them hard to use and stand when not frozen. I also tried Bonafide baby which I liked better but would freeze too thick and took more space in my freezer. These bags are awesome- freeze thin, stand up in the fridge no problem, never leak and are made in a sturdy material. I do have to mention the bag being hard to reopen after being zipped shut. But overall, i love these bags and haven’t found anything better out there. Do yourself a favor and buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adelacolina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheaper option to other brands of breast milk storage bags. The plastic is much sturdier than other bags. They freeze flat really well. I like that these can stand up straight after you pour so you don't loose any milk in the event you didn't seal it correctly right away. I haven't had any issues with leakage or difficulty opening like some of the other reviewers. Also the giraffe design on the bags are cute!! My only negative comment is that the measurements on the bag are not accurate. The bag will not hold a full 8 ounces. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Renju James

customer_reviews.title: Nearly impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a pack of these with my first baby and thought they were fine overall for storing breastmilk. For this reason I figured I would buy them again. I don't know what has changed since I bought them a few years ago, but they are absolutely awful now. Do not buy these. The main problem is that they are almost impossible to open. I have broken so many of them because the Ziploc feature simply won't open and ends up tearing away from the sides. It's incredibly frustrating and I feel like I wasted money on these. Don't bother with these. Buy the lansinoh or Medela bags. They are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The best bags! Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I spent a long time researching bags because I tried a lot of bags with holes or that came dirty on the outside or were not made very well! These are thicker than other bags so they’re sturdy, it has a double zipper, and they’re clean! It doesn’t rip when I defrost the milk either. These are so awesome! I love these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hong

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad that these bags have ruined over a months supply of my wife's milk. The bags make the milk smell like new plastic and my baby will not take them. Some bags do not have the new plastic smell and my baby is fine. But so far, 60% of the bags are unuseable..... So frustrated and disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used any other brand, so I don’t have anything to compare with but I’ve been using these for several weeks now and so far I’m very pleased - they do not leak, are very sturdy and convenient. I’ll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite storage bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I used to use the Lansinoh storage bags but had a lot of issues with leaky bags. These are great quality. I have not noticed an issue with these leaking. I also love that these can hold up to 8 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the BEST bags I have come across, both in function and price. This was the first, and only, 8oz bag I have found and they are amazing. They are sturdy enough that they stand when you’re pouring milk in and they don’t callapse when you lay them down in the freezer and stack other bags on top. The bag is full too when you go to close it up, making it easier to get the air out (unlike 6oz bags that I feel have wasted space). Will definitely continue to buy these and recommend them to other moms
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, but preferred The Very Breast Milk Storage bags
customer_reviews.text: These work well, only 4 stars because they NEVER tear straight along the perforated line, they always rip crooked and they never measure accurately. Haven't run into any that leak, but I'm also very careful and never lay them flat to defrost. I've never discovered any holes in them and they seem to be clean. I preferred The Very Breast Milk Storage Bags, they were the absolute best ever, but they stopped selling on Amazon for whatever reason.
customer_reviews.author: AlissiaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! I use them to store my breast milk, both in the fridge and freezer. I put them in a bottle warmer before pouring the breast milk into a bottle. It takes about one minute to warm the milk. I usually to make it the same temp as when it was expressed because I don’t want to destroy its nutrients. One con, is that it’s hard to use the measurements on the bags but it’s not a big deal for me. I use the Medela’s 80 ml cup to measure my breast milk.
customer_reviews.author: marcheswow

customer_reviews.title: Narrow openings but awesome bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags except for the fact that the opening is very small and my pump pieces do not fit so I can't pump directly into the bag. Otherwise I really like these bags, much thicker plastic than any of the others. UPDATE: will buy again. I dropped a bag (with milk in it) on the floor and wouldn't you know it, it didn't break or pop open! Very easy to get bags apart when frozen. I've tried other brands and have ripped frozen bags trying to pull them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: You might get thick bags or you might get thin ones
customer_reviews.text: I have an "over abundant" milk supply so the 8oz. volume is great! I have ordered 6 times and 3 times the bags were different. They weren't as thick, the tear off wasn't perforated, and the seal lines were closer together. Left is pic of the thinner bags, right is the more sturdy. I have always ordered the 110 ct from Amazon so it's just the luck of the draw if you get thon or thick bags. They still do the job either way.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Entire lot oF bags is faulty. Zip locks are sealed shut and I can’t open them without tearing the bag and ruining it. This is the first batch of bags that was bad though. I’ve ordered from them before and the bags were great. Just upset that I wasted my money on bags I can’t use. I have lost about 20 ounces to bags that had holes I didn’t notice.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The bags are very well made , double zip seals , never leak a drop . The measurement is very inaccurate but how could it be ? It's a bag after all . The pump bottles have measurement on them anyway. Tip: lay bags flat to freeze , saves Tom's of space . Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: William H. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These storage bags are the cream of the crop!! ..breastmilk pun :) The plastic is so thick, finally a bag that wont leak! Well worth the price. As with most bags, the measurement is slightly off. You can see the picture of the bag shows 4oz but the bottle is slightly less than 4. I've found that if you squeeze both corners of the zipper to get a more cylindrical shape, that gives you the most accurate measurement. So glad I purchased these bags and will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality storage bags
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these storage bags for about 5 months and love them. They freeze well, no leaks, and are a thicker/sturdier plastic (which is helpful when I pour thawed milk into bottles). I am breastfeeding twins, so I am always looking for good quality products that help make our lives a little easier day to day. Also love that I receive a discount code with each order, it’s a nice little touch that makes me feel appreciated as a customer!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! The thicker plastic is great for freezing flat and I've never had a leak issue. Pouring into them is easy and they stand up great - makes freezing milk so much easier. They have the lines for name, volume, etc facing upright with the bag so I can see them easily when I have them standing in a container. The individual seal reassures me that they are sterile. You just cannot go wrong with these bags!
customer_reviews.author: R. Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags because they're heavy duty and don't tear easily and they seal well. However, they are difficult to get open which I'm willing to overlook because they are cost effective and don't get small tears when transporting frozen milk.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags feel like very good quality (thick and unlikely to leak), compared to the Lansinoh and Target bags I also purchased. The edges have a thick seal, and the double zip across the top work very well and I never have any issue while using the bags. I like that it also lays flatter than other bags as well, so I am not using up so much freezer room which is at a premium these days.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Quality bags, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two boxes just before my LO was born and I just ordered 2 more boxes. These bags are thick, stand-alone, quality bags. They fit at least 8 oz (I've put 9 in before and still had not problems), and I've never had one leak, and that includes while traveling to-and-from work crammed in a lunchbox. My only complaint is that the perforation can be a bit difficult to tear unless you've bent the top part back and forth a few times. Otherwise, great quality product with great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Coop

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to open the zip lock. I ripped 5 bags before I was able to open one successfully. Even kore difficult to open when milk is locked inside. Haven’t had a leak but I would never purchase these again. Too much of a hassle to open the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cakelady

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the lansinoh bags but those were flimsy and would leak when the milk thawed. This brand is superior and the bags don't leave at all! I am impressed by how it can withstand when I accidentally dropped it. Even though it's an 8 oz bag, it has room for at least 10 oz! And the price and value is unbeatable compared to other brands out there!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Oh

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags to store milk for my baby who was born in June. Cannot recommend enough. Never leaked. Measurements on the bag aren't necessarily accurate but this is likely because of the hard plastic. I usually poured milk from a bottle with measuring lines so this wasn't an issue for me as I didn't use the markings to know how much milk had been poured in. Somewhat hard to open so I used scissors to open them once I defrosted milk. Overall felt they were easier to use than Lansinoh and was pleased that I didn't lose any milk.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Roguski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...they leak!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these at first, large capacity, no leaks when filled due to double zip closure and sturdy, thick material. However, when thawed from frozen, they LEAK!! I can’t for the life of me figure out what is causing the leaks. It’s not always from a seam. I’d say one out of every 6 I’ve thawed has leaked. So much for every drop being precious huh?!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Durable good quality bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Leak proof and durable for a great price. I had to give it 4 stars though as the measurements are completely off, over an ounce. They're so off they might as well not be there as it's useless and takes up writing room. That being said I will continue to repurchase despite the inaccurate measurements as you can't beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: meeks

customer_reviews.title: Great larger bags
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags. The best thing about them is that they are a larger size than I was able to find in my local Target. I produce a lot of milk, so being able to store 8oz instead of 6oz means less bags to store in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I have such issues with the other bags I’ve froze. They all well not all but all the other brands leak. Like 2 out of 10 leak. So I’m putting them all in zip lock bags before defrosting. None of these have leaked!! I just put them on the counter or directly in the warmer or in a hot cup of water. So much easier then having to go through zip lock bags like crazy!! I put 4 of these boxes on my registry for my next baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Meganjbelev

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Several of these have not opened correctly in that when I first open them the two sides stick together so instead of being able to resell them the seals stay together and the bags leak. They’re also harder to get to lay flat than I have found other bags to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy thick bags that stand on their own. I'm very happy with them. I also love that they hold 8 oz instead if 5-6. I pump for twins so one meal is 3.5-4 oz per baby, so one package for both babies meal is convenient. It makes a huge difference when pumping and storing larger quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOU FILL THE BAG PROPERLY.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. 3rd time buying them and not a SINGLE bag has leaked. For those that say they don't hold 8 oz, you have to gently squeeze the sides of the bag on the seams to make it open wider and be more accurate as you pour the milk in. I've always fit 8 oz in just fine and never had a problem closing them. If you're struggling on the first day, don't instantly brand it the bags' fault. I had to figure it out myself and it took a week without anyone to help give me advice. Once I realized how to use the bags properly, I am in love. No other bags compare.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Worst bags ever
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I am so frustrated with these bags that I felt the need to write one. I have lost about 20 of these bags in the past couple weeks due to breaking while opening. The bags are extremely difficult to open and they end up breaking around the zip lock in the process making them useless. I’ve had multiple people try to open them in case it was just me and same thing. I am honestly very disappointed and will be going back to Lasinoh Bags next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: In the past I’ve tried some of the name brands but they weren’t thick enough. After seeing many reviews for these bags on Amazon and I’m so happy I purchased them. They hold 8 ozs., are thick and easy to read and closes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I haven’t experienced any leaks. Very durable and easy to use. However, measurements are not 100% accurate but it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: CK112

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I have over 1,000 oz in stored breast milk so I’ve used A LOT of storage bags and these are the worst! They won’t seal easily, leave air pockets, and are hard to open to pour milk into. Would recommend trying another brand; not a value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great breastmilk bag
customer_reviews.text: I have never had any problems out of these bags. I store A LOT of breastmilk and these are the best bang for your buck. I send these to the babysitters(50 minute drive from my house), so they travel well, they have never leaked. Lay down flat if you freeze them that way and can fit multiple bags inside large gallon size ziplock bags for storing milk in freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Melton

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love this bags! I’ve ordered a second order already! I love how durable and thick they are. Lines are accurate if you can manage to squeeze the air out of it and push the milk down. Lay them flat in the freezer and they work out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A.Gonyea

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well-made bags
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these bags so far. I read many reviews on different products and bought these due to good reviews and amount of bags you get for the price. I haven't thawed any milk yet, but no leaks in the fridge so far. They are easy to fill and lie flat. The double lock is also a nice feature. The biggest negative review I read is that they are difficult to tear open. I tear along the perforation halfway from each side, meeting in the middle, and haven't had any issues. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING quality! They're a lot thicker than the bags I normally use. They have not leaked yet when warming which is a huge bonus. The only thing that I dislike is that they can be difficult to open- however, that is due to the fact that it is good quality, so I can't complain! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Bags that don’t leak!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on baby number four and I LOVE these bags. Others have leaked for me in the past, but these never have. I just run my finger over the zip twice to make sure it’s good, and viola! Perfect seal. None of the bags on the market are accurate on the fill lines, but if you open this one all the way up, it comes close. Pump into a bottle and use that to measure/mark.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestFamily

customer_reviews.title: They are also sturdy. Don't pay attn to the numbers on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple bags but these stand up on their own as you pour in the liquid which is clutch. They are also sturdy. Don't pay attn to the numbers on the side every bag has them but look on your collection bottles to write down how much you put in. They are challenging to reopen but we just cut them open.
customer_reviews.author: JayeJean

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am finishing up my first box of these bags and they are great! There is only one other brand of bags I have used to compare it to and both bags were equally great. These bags are thick and sturdy for freezing, fridge storage, and thawing. They are also easy to pour into. I have a freezer stash I am thawing out and have had no leaks. I exclusively pump and find these really dependable. They also freeze flat with some weight on top of the bag. I will be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dmonse

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These aren't my favorite bags, but I haven't had an issue with them and they are a good price. They are thick, but quite rigid in a way that i don't like, it makes them difficult to fill and seal. The tear off tops are a step that is unnecessary and i would prefer not to have, there are plenty of sterile bags that don't come that way. I haven't had any leaks with them yet though, so I don't have any real complaints other than that they just aren't my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 50 to begin with and was so pleased with the thickness of the bag and the double ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read the reviews for most storage bags, and this is the only one where leaking was not a main concern. I ordered 50 to begin with and was so pleased with the thickness of the bag and the double zipper. Recently, I had to use some medela bags as an emergency, and I was shocked how thin and flimsy it was compared to Mommy's Precious! And it did leak a little b/c of the single zipper : ( Although these are expensive, its totally worth it. I would not use any other brand. Breast milk is too important and precious.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lau

customer_reviews.title: The only bags I use
customer_reviews.text: These bags are all that you need to store breastmilk safely and cleanly in the refrigerator or freezer. They can be a bit difficult to get open. But once you do get them open they do the job with a double-zip closure. Make sure you squeeze the closure securely across the top so it is all closed, but once you do then you can lay them flat or if they fall over they do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bags. I found other bags leaked after being frozen and then thawed. I came back to these bags after having that issue since I knew they didn't leak. Should have just stuck with them from the beginning. I would suggest these to anyone else looking for easy use breast milk freezer bags.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my fourth order of these bags and have had no issues. No leaking, no tearing. From reading other reviews it certainly seems like there are some spotty QC issues with manufacturing, but all of the bags I've received have been perfect. These are very thick, especially when compared to Target and Lansinoh bags. These seem to take up a little more freezer space because of the thickness of the material and the construction of the standing base. For the price and convenience of Prime delivery, these are my absolute favorite milk storage bags.
customer_reviews.author: E. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value & works great!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are strong & hold more than the other bags I've used. I haven't had any leaks in the month and a half I've been using them! The measurements on the bags are pretty accurate, much more so than any other brand bag I've used (and that's quite a few!). I'll be buying these again when I start getting low.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tarkowski

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints with these bags. They work ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints regarding these bags. They work as advertised and are the most economical solution I have seen so far. I plan on buying these again. Update I After using these bags for almost six months I can say I am even happier than when I first started using them. I have experienced zero failures out of more than bags. This impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Sweeny Todd

customer_reviews.title: Do not pump 8oz bottles to be frozen in this bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag always reads an ounce more than what’s in the bottle. I was pumping 7oz bottles so it read 8oz in the bag. Out of about 25 bags I lost 3 due to leaking when thawing in warm-not boiling- bowl of water. This was upsetting because any nursing mother knows that her milk is like liquid gold- just lost! Then your child is ready to eat- not always happy about waiting for another bag to be thawed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. They are a bit challenging to get open at first but all of mine have been leak proof so far. The plastic is thicker than others which I like, and they are more true to amounts.
customer_reviews.author: jessicaw1115

customer_reviews.title: Seal Breaks Very Easily
customer_reviews.text: The seal on these bags is very temperamental. I have wasted about half of the bags trying to open them. Rather than separating the seal it is very easy to accidentally tear the seal off the side of the bag rendering it useless. When I have been able to get the bag to open without breaking the seal they have worked fine but I have had to throw about half of the bags away due to breaking the seal when trying to open the bag. So these end up not really being any cheaper than other brand bags.
customer_reviews.author: ewhite

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: I work full time and pump while I'm there. I freeze all my milk. Storage bags can be expensive and most only let you save 6 ounces safely. These bags have been lifesavers. I used to fill the other brand bags up higher than the line because I needed the freezer space and because they are so expensive it felt wasteful to only put 6 ounces in. I should have been using 4 or 5 bags of the other brands a day but now I can safely use 3 Mommy's Precious bags and know my milk is safe. The price is great for the number of bags you get and how much they hold.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W Tiedt

customer_reviews.title: 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bags! I kept having issues with bags leaking all over my freezer, these are the only bags I have found that don't leak! I read a few reviews that you couldn't actually fit 8 oz in them, that's a lie, I can fit 8 oz in a bag no issue. The oz in the side of the bag is pretty accurate, as accurate as a plastic bag can be
customer_reviews.author: Jon K Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have purchased these over and over. The higher cost per bag is worth it for the quality that you get, and the milk you save! I like the capacity of these, as I regularly pump more than 6oz at a time. They are sturdy, and have not had one leak when defrosting like some other bag brands do.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette H

customer_reviews.title: Value is Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very thick, which is wonderful! The zipper can be a tad difficult to open, and they don't freeze flat. I have not thawed any yet, so cannot comment on leaks at the moment. The value is exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking around and buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I am pumping exclusively, for the first time ever and these are by far one of the best things I have bought for exclusive pumping. I have used one entire bag already within two weeks and not one bag was faulty. Like others have mentioned the measurements are not accurate but that doesn’t matter much to me since I measure from the bottles before I switch to the bags. I have ordered two more packs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good bags
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with these bags. I've used a couple other brands in the past, these feel like the plastic is a little thicker. They're a bit harder to pour into than some others I've used, but you get the hang of it. Also not sure about the measurements, every thing I use has a different measurement. The pump, the bags, the bottles. I just use a guess-timate and it's fine. No spills or leaks
customer_reviews.author: Renee Thielman

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE THE BAGS YOU WANT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bags. They are thick, have a double zipper and haven't had any issue with leaking!! I've tried several other bags and none of them came close to these bags! I am an over producer and have a 7 cubic ft freezer full of breast milk and I feel like I can trust these bags. They are great to freeze laying down. I know they are a little pricey but they are worth the price to protect your liquid gold!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have used Parent's choice and lansinoh bags but Mommy's Precious are my favorite. They're very sturdy and freeze flatter than the other brands. As long as you wipe any spills out of the zipper they will not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Chigger

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got these bags they were super sturdy and think. The second go round the seal is so strong I’m literally pulling the bag away from the seal when I’m trying to open them to put milk in.. I’ve done this about 5-6 times now. So strange.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Medela
customer_reviews.text: I have tried tons of bags. My favorites are the target up and up brand. The plastic these are made of are more similar to the Medela bags. It’s a stiffer plastic, making it easier to poor and more accurate when used to measure. But, they don’t lay as flat. I have not yet had to defrost one of these bags. So not sure if they leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 110 Count Breastmilk Storage Bags 8 Oz 235 ml Breastfeeding Freezer Storage Container Bags for Breast Milk comes Pre Sterilized & BPA Free with Accurate Measurements & Leak Proof. Buy Now!
product_meta.description:
10% more bags than other brands. Save More of Your Precious Liquid Gold with Mommy’s Precious Breastmilk Storage Bags. Perfect companion for your breastpump.

Designed by Parents for Parents. Sold New only by Mommy's Precious! Accept no imitations!

 * Are you tired of Breast Milk Storage Bags that Leak?
 * Are you disappointed by the inaccuracy of the measurements on most Breastmilk Storage Bags?
 * Do you want Milk Bags that will actually Freeze Flat?
 * Are you sick of hard to label bags that don’t have the necessary info tabs for you to write on?

Introducing Mommy’s Precious Breastmilk Storage Bags to solve all your problems!

 * Double Zip Lock design to prevent leaks
 * 8 Oz / 250 ML to store more of your precious liquid gold
 * BPA & Phthalate Free for guaranteed safety of your baby
 * Pre Sterilized for ease of use
 * Accurate measurements to ensure your baby gets the exact amount of breast milk intended for them
 * Gusseted bottom design so that bag can stand by itself once milk is poured in for easy handling
 * Freezes flat for space saving when not overfilled

You get 110 pieces of Pre Sterilized BPA Free Breastmilk Storage Bags, 10% more than other brands.

We stand by our product so your satisfaction is guaranteed by our 100% money back policy.

We Cannot Guarantee this Special Pricing, So Be Sure to Click Buy Now!
feature_bullets: LEAK PROOF AND SELF STANDING – We strive to ensure that your bags won’t leak and waste away those precious liquid gold. We know how hard it is to lose those precious breast milk. We also have gusseted bottom making one handed operations a breeze.
SAFETY GUARANTEED BPA BPS FREE PHTHALATE FREE LATEX FREE PRE STERILIZED – We ensure that safety for your baby is at our upmost concern when designing these breast milk storage bags.

ACCURATE MEASUREMENT LINES & FRONT FACING WRITEABLE TABS – We made sure to measure the weight of milk when we designed these bags to ensure the measuring lines are accurate. Our lines are 95% accurate. Our tabs also face you so that you can write the details on easily.
PERFORATED LINE FOR EASY STRAIGHT LINE TEAR – We designed the tear area to have a perforated line making it easier to tear open and it always tears in a straight line every time.

DESIGNED BY PARENTS FOR PARENTS – At Mommy’s Precious we are parents too. We love our babies and know just how much it means to give your child the best love and care they deserve. That’s why we designed this breast milk storage container bags for you with the best thoughts in mind.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,097 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
